Dialogues: Ruth#Oh, good morning. Getting curious I see.
Ruth#Grandma always said that cuirosity is the apple of the pie.
Ruth#So don't shy away from it!
#*Ruth can feel something stir in her mind. Words form inside her head,*

Gnome inside of Ruth's head#My study is now complete.
We have chosen you.
Be prepared.
Ruth#What is it you have chosen me for?
#*The gnome's nose looks very serious, but it's silent inside Ruth's head.*
